p:
Pimpinella affinis is one of the most important species in Apiaceae family with proven antioxidant and antibacterial properties.
10 Plant EOs and extracts have a role in spoilage and pathogenic bacteria control and food shelf life increase. Antimicrobial mechanism of the EOs is due to the effect on the lipid or phospholipid of cell membranes leading to cell membranes structure disruption and cellular components release.
